const getCategoryIcon=category=>{const icons={'Hunch':'💡','Wisdom':'📊','Nudge':'👉','Spell':'✨'};return icons[category]||'▶️';};const getCategoryColor=category=>{const colors={'Hunch':'bg-yellow-100 border-yellow-300','Wisdom':'bg-blue-100 border-blue-300','Nudge':'bg-green-100 border-green-300','Spell':'bg-purple-100 border-purple-300'};return colors[category]||'bg-gray-100 border-gray-300';};export default Playground;
